flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 7/10 = <<40*7/10=28>>28 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=50>>50 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 50 x 3/5 = <<50*3/5=250/3>>250/3 games.
So, it still needs to win 250/3 - 28 = <<250/3-28=166/3>>166/3 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - 166/3 = <<10-166/3=-136/3>>-136/3 games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 250/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
